title: A true relation of the proceeings [sic] of the Scotch army since their advance from Nottingham untill 30. Iuly 1645. Exprest in a letter from the Lord Generalls quarters. Published by authority.
publisher: Printed by M.B. for Robert Bostock at the Kings head in Pauls Churchyard.,
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: the 2nd e in proceeings has been altered to a d.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
